5 #include <ros/ros.h>
6 #include "geometry_msgs/Quaternion.h"
7 #include "tf/transform_datatypes.h"
8 #include "angles/angles.h"
9 
10 void getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(geometry_msgs::Quaternion orientation, double& roll,double& pitch, double& yaw)
11 {
12  tf::Quaternion quat;
13  tf::quaternionMsgToTF(orientation,quat);
14  quat.normalize();
15  tf::Matrix3x3 mat(quat);
16  mat.getRPY(roll, pitch,yaw);
17 }
18 
19 void printQuat(geometry_msgs::Quaternion quat, std::string name)
20 {
21  ROS_INFO_STREAM(name << " quat : " << quat.x << " " << quat.y << " " << quat.z << " " << quat.w << " ");
22 }
23 
24 void printRPY(double roll, double pitch, double yaw, std::string name)
25 {
26  ROS_INFO_STREAM(name<< " RPY (deg) : " << angles::to_degrees(roll) << " " << angles::to_degrees(pitch) << " " << angles::to_degrees(yaw) << " ");
27 }
28 
29 geometry_msgs::Quaternion multiplyQuaternionsMSG(geometry_msgs::Quaternion quat_1, geometry_msgs::Quaternion quat_2)
30 {
31  tf::Quaternion orig, rot, result;
32  geometry_msgs::Quaternion q_new;
33 
34  tf::quaternionMsgToTF(quat_1, orig);
35  tf::quaternionMsgToTF(quat_2, rot);
36 
37  result=orig*rot;
38  result.normalize();
39 
40  tf::quaternionTFToMsg(result, q_new);
41 
42  return q_new;
43 }
44 
45 int main(int argc, char **argv)
46 {
47  ros::init(argc, argv, "quaternion_tester");
48  ros::NodeHandle nh;
49 
50  geometry_msgs::Quaternion q_orig, q_rot, q_new;
51  tf::Quaternion q_temp;
52 
53  // ORIGINAL
54  q_temp.setRPY(angles::from_degrees(60),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0));
55  tf::quaternionTFToMsg(q_temp,q_orig);
56 
57  // ROTATION
58  q_temp.setRPY(angles::from_degrees(40),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0));
59  tf::quaternionTFToMsg(q_temp,q_rot);
60 
61  q_new=multiplyQuaternionsMSG(q_orig, q_rot);
62 
63  double orig_rol, orig_pit, orig_yaw;
64  double rot_rol, rot_pit, rot_yaw;
65  double new_rol, new_pit, new_yaw;
66 
67  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(q_orig,orig_rol, orig_pit, orig_yaw);
68  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(q_rot, rot_rol, rot_pit, rot_yaw);
69  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(q_new, new_rol, new_pit, new_yaw);
70 
71  ROS_INFO("TEST QUATERNION MULTIPLICATION");
72 
73  printQuat(q_orig,"Q_orig");
74  printRPY(orig_rol,orig_pit,orig_yaw,"Q_orig");
75 
76  printQuat(q_rot,"Q_rot");
77  printRPY(rot_rol, rot_pit, rot_yaw,"Q_rot");
78 
79  printQuat(q_new,"Q_new");
80  printRPY(new_rol, new_pit, new_yaw, "Q_new");
81 
82 
83  ROS_INFO("-------------------------------------------------------------------------------");
84  ROS_INFO("-------------------------------------------------------------------------------");
85  ROS_INFO("REDO TEST WITH RPY ADDITION");
86 
87  // NOTE : This is NOT a rotation. This is simply adding RPY.
88  new_rol=orig_rol+rot_rol;
89  new_pit=orig_pit+rot_pit;
90  new_yaw=orig_yaw+rot_yaw;
91 
92 
93  q_temp.setRPY(new_rol, new_pit, new_yaw);
94  tf::quaternionTFToMsg(q_temp, q_new);
95 
96  printQuat(q_new,"Q_new");
97  printRPY(new_rol, new_pit, new_yaw, "Q_new");
98 
99 
100 
101  ros::spinOnce();
102 
103 }
